body:
samtools needed more constraints for htslib, and abi-dumper was missing pkg-config on the dependency universal ctags

You can see successful builds here:
 - https://github.com/autamus/registry/actions/runs/1167444242
 - https://github.com/autamus/registry/actions/runs/1167274397

Signed-off-by: vsoch <vsoch@users.noreply.github.com>
title: Fixing bugs with new package updates for samtools and abi-dumper
